meta.description: Maximize the total profit from selling products A, B, and byproduct C considering production and disposal constraints.

params.name: front_process_time
params.description: Time required for the front process per unit of product

params.name: back_process_time
params.description: Time required for the back process per unit of product

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of product sold

params.name: byproduct_profit
params.description: Profit per unit of byproduct C sold

params.name: disposal_cost
params.description: Cost per unit of byproduct C disposed

params.name: byproduct_per_B
params.description: Units of byproduct C generated per unit of product B

params.name: max_byproduct_sale
params.description: Maximum units of byproduct C that can be sold

vars.name: x
vars.description: Units of each product to produce

vars.name: y
vars.description: Units of byproduct C to sell

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: profit['A'] * x['A'] + profit['B'] * x['B'] + byproduct_profit * y - disposal_cost * (byproduct_per_B * x['B'] - y)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from products A, B, and byproduct C

constraints.name: front_process_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total front process time cannot exceed available time

constraints.name: back_process_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total back process time cannot exceed available time

constraints.name: byproduct_sale_constraint
constraints.description: Units of byproduct C sold cannot exceed maximum allowed

constraints.name: byproduct_balance_constraint
constraints.description: Units of byproduct C sold cannot exceed units generated
